page.title: 02Independent Education
page.content: Education within the block is solely in the hands of the Independent sector, the nearest State schools being outside the area. Slindon College is a boys boarding and day school of approximately 170 boys. Great Ballard is a mixed sex Preparatory school in Eartham where children are entered for Common Entrance. At Slindon College, the boys are encouraged to participate in all the normal academic areas. The academic range of the pupils is from Remedial to 'A' level, and all the children are taught in small groups, but it is in its pastoral care that it excells. Boys are expected to help with the care of the many animals which are about the grounds.These include goats, sheep,wallabies,chickens and the more usual rabbits and guinea pigs.
